name: Gomu Gomu no Mi
power: Rubber Body â€” Grants extreme elasticity and immunity to blunt attacks.
description: The legendary fruit eaten by Monkey D. Luffy, turning his body into rubber.

name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix
